schema_description: Micro Personal Finance App with sidebar navigation and comprehensive expense tracking features

atoms.description: No new atomic components needed beyond the provided design system

molecules.description: Reusable components composed from atoms for finance app functionality

ExpenseCard.description: Displays individual expense information with amount, category, and note

QuickActionButton.description: Quick access button for common actions

BudgetProgressBar.description: Visual representation of budget progress and remaining amount

SavingsJarWidget.description: Visual progress indicator for savings jar goal

SubscriptionCard.description: Card displaying subscription details with amount and renewal date

CategorySelector.description: Dropdown or selection component for expense categories

ExpenseForm.description: Form for adding new expenses with amount, category, and note fields

FilterControls.description: Controls for filtering expenses by category, date, or amount

organisms.description: Smart UI components with logic composed of molecules

AppSidebar.description: Persistent navigation sidebar with collapsible functionality
specs: display persistent sidebar on left for navigation
sidebar includes links: Home, Add Expense, Charts, Subscriptions, Savings Jar, Budget, Expense History
highlight current active link in sidebar
sidebar collapsible for smaller screens

TopBar.description: Top navigation bar with logo, profile menu, and notifications
specs: top bar includes app logo, profile menu, and notifications icon

GlobalWidgetBar.description: Persistent bar showing global financial widgets
specs: bottom or top persistent bar shows global widgets: total spending, remaining budget, savings jar progress

HomeOverview.description: Home screen overview with spending summary and quick actions
specs: show today's spending summary and remaining budget
display recent expenses list
show visual progress of savings jar goal
quick access buttons for Add Expense, Charts, Subscriptions

AddExpenseForm.description: Form organism for adding new expenses
specs: allow entering expense amount, category, and note
show recent/frequent categories for quick selection
display confirmation toast after adding expense
update budget bar and charts in real-time

SpendingChartsDisplay.description: Charts and visualizations for spending analysis
specs: show daily and weekly spending charts
highlight categories with highest spend
allow filtering by category or date range
update dynamically when new expenses are added
list all active subscriptions with amount and renewal date
allow adding, editing, and removing subscriptions
show monthly summary of subscription spending
highlight upcoming renewals

SavingsJarManager.description: Interface for managing savings jar and goals
specs: show current total and goal progress
allow changing the savings goal
automatically round up new expenses
display visual progress bar consistently in shell
allow setting monthly/weekly budget
show remaining budget as a progress bar
highlight overspending
update in real-time when expenses are added

ExpenseHistoryList.description: Detailed expense history with filtering and editing capabilities
specs: allow viewing full expense history
filter by category, date, or amount
edit or delete individual expenses
show contribution of each expense to daily/weekly/monthly totals

pages.description: Top-level application pages with routing and layout

HomePage.description: Main dashboard showing financial overview and quick actions
specs: display persistent sidebar on left for navigation
highlight current active link in sidebar
sidebar collapsible for smaller screens
top bar includes app logo, profile menu, and notifications icon
bottom or top persistent bar shows global widgets: total spending, remaining budget, savings jar progress
content area changes dynamically based on selected navigation link
maintain layout consistency across all screens
support responsive design with sidebar collapsing into hamburger menu on mobile

ChartsPage.description: Spending analysis and charts visualization page

ExpenseHistoryPage.description: Detailed expense history and management page
